title: send to not working
content: I can't seem to get Thunderbird configured correctly to get the "send to" function to work. As in sending a file from the desktop. I checked the default file association, and it looks to be set correctly. Help! And thanks.
creator: pennypincher

title: Local files
content: Help! I've been using Thunderbird for 2 years and just discovered that my Local Files only go back 1 year. Being used to Eudora who kept things forever, I am dismayed at this: how can I stop Thunderbird from deleting my important files!?
creator: carolbrad

title: Thunderbird works well as a video production interface.
content:
SOME of my videos I need for text and images on a white back ground, with indentation, for the "Play Pause Play" videos, and the almost infinite scroll on a white back ground works really well.

A simple screen capture video program and away we go.


https://www.mgtow.tv/v/vDMiHP
creator: wrogerwroger

title: Signature on Replies
content:
I have a Signature setup and it works great on NEW Emails, however, if I click on reply to an email the signature is not there. I have the checkbox checked for "Include signature for replies" but it doesn't seem to work. I've tried unchecking it, restarting the app, re-checking it and restarting again, still doesn't work.

Windows 11 Pro, Version 10.0.26200 Build 26200
creator: rwrogers2

title: Version 146 does not work on my laptop; Version 145 was working fine.  146 is now frozen 90% of the time.
content: Ever since Version 146 was automatically downloaded, all I see is a blank page and several icons across the top representing individual mail. (See pic attached. Before 146, I saw all my mail listed.) The program freezes; I can't click on any icons. Most of the time I am just waiting for something to load. I have to fight to get my folders to even see my mail. How do I get Version 145 back?

title: Thunderbird Integration Gmail adressen
content:
Hi guys I do have various email address from hotmail and Gmail. After outlook did not synchronize all of my Hotmail mail accounts I wanted to switch to thunderbird.

Now I do have the following issue. I want to add a Gmail account into my thunderbird. After typing in email address and password I am being redirected to Google.. I click on further and then I see a white page and the website is not loading at all. Once i go back to thunderbird it says login not possible with OAuth. Whatever this means. How can I solve this?
creator: kevklapper
